comments.html:
Just curious on the state of OTV vice MPLS/VPN on the Nexus. Is it a stop-gap until the platform supports MPLS/VPN? Why would one choose OTV over MPLS/VPN.

Love the site!
comments.name: dj spry

comments.html: If you need L2 interconnect (for example, to support inter-DC vMotion), use OTV. If your applications can work with L3 interconnect, but require path isolation, use MPLS/VPN.
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak

comments.html: Gotcha.  And I presume the OTV vs VPLS is a debate much to large for a comment section:)  As I guess that is where my confusion - between OTV and VPLS.
